# The Islands {.unnumbered}

## Background

The Islands is a virtual real-time environment that consist of three climatically distinct islands with distinct human populations living their lives. The Islands was originally developed for learning research design, sampling observations, experiments, and surveys of related to human health, but a new feature was included to look at *plants*. This will be our focus in this unit.

Allow you learn 
sampling, obvservation vs experiments
surveys 

In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
